rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {4504}
(Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {SWK1011} and  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS1359, ATS1840} and  Must have passed 48 (I/W) credit points at levels {1})

description: This unit will broadly explore the legal mandate and legal processes through which policies in social welfare are implemented. It will also consider key legal dilemmas that impact on social welfare service delivery.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
